entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Flurries over northern sections in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
